code: class  Solution  {   public :   long  long  zeroFilledSubarray ( vector < int >&  nums )  {   long  ans  =  0 ;   int  indexBeforeZero  =  -1 ;   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  nums . size ();  ++ i )   if  ( nums [ i ])   indexBeforeZero  =  i ;   else   ans  +=  i  -  indexBeforeZero ;   return  ans ;   }  };
